atk-s0302a1:2_1: Abhisamayasaṁyuttassa paṭhame nakhasikhāyanti maṁsaṭṭhānena vimutte nakhagge.
atk-s0302a1:2_2: Nakhasikhā ca nāma lokiyānaṁ mahatīpi hoti, satthu pana rattuppalapattakoṭi viya sukhumā.
atk-s0302a1:2_4: Bhagavatā hi atthaṁ ñāpetukāmena adhiṭṭhānabalena tattha patiṭṭhāpito.
atk-s0302a1:2_5: Satimaṁ kalanti mahāpathaviyā paṁsuṁ satakoṭṭhāse katvā tato ekakoṭṭhāsaṁ. Paratopi eseva nayo.
atk-s0302a1:2_7: Purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāyāti etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ, yadidaṁ parikkhīṇanti evaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ upanidhāya, ñāṇena taṁ tassa santike ṭhapetvā upaparikkhiyamāneti attho.
atk-s0302a1:2_8: Katamaṁ panettha purimadukkhaṁ nāma? Yaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ. Katamaṁ pana parikkhīṇaṁ?
atk-s0302a1:2_9: Yaṁ paṭhamamaggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya. Katamaṁ pana upanidhāya?
atk-s0302a1:2_10: Yaṁ sattasu attabhāvesu apāye aṭṭhamañca paṭisandhiṁ ādiṁ katvā yattha katthaci uppajjeyya, sabbaṁ taṁ parikkhīṇanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0302a1:2_11: Sattakkhattunti satta vāre, sattasu attabhāvesūti attho.
atk-s0302a1:4_0: 75. Dutiye pokkharaṇīti vāpī. Ubbedhenāti gambhīratāya. Samatittikāti mukhavaṭṭisamā.
atk-s0302a1:4_1: Kākapeyyāti sakkā hoti tīre ṭhitena kākena pakatiyāpi mukhatuṇḍikaṁ otāretvā pātuṁ. Dutiyaṁ.
atk-s0302a1:6_3: Dve vā ti vāti dve vā tīṇi vā.
atk-s0302a1:6_5: Saṁbhejjaudakanti aññāhi nadīhi saddhiṁ sambhinnaṭṭhāne udakaṁ. Catutthaṁ uttānatthameva. Tatiyacatutthāni.
atk-s0302a1:8_5: Pariyosāne pana aññatitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakānaṁ adhigamoti bāhirakānaṁ sabbopi guṇādhigamo paṭhamamaggena adhigataguṇānaṁ satabhāgampi sahassabhāgampi satasahassabhāgampi na upagacchatīti. Pañcamādīni.
